name: Over(Tea)Time
description:
You forgot Tea Time!

Now you have to collect all the important items (shown at the top) and deliver them to the table as fast as you can!

Controls:

arrow keys right and left to move

spacebar to jump

c to collect and deliver items

Submission to TriJam #156

Sadly I couldnt complete the game in 3 hours. When the 3 hour mark passed I had the basic gameplay done but nothing more. So I thought to myself: Now that I couldnt finish it in 3 hours I might aswell spend some more hours to make the game pretty. After 8 more hours of programming, creating pixel art and composing a little soundtrack I finished and uploaded the game. And I am happy that I did!
